page.title: 15Law and Order (3)
page.content: Although for many years crime has increased nationally at a rate of 6%,the average person usually imapines the burglaries and other crimes will not affect them.The majority of victims of crime,however,have never been victims before,and unless you take the elementry precautions to remove temptation and make things difficult for the criminal,it is probable that you too will become a victum because there is so many break ins the 1980's.Pensioners are at risk the most.In North Shields a pensioner was attacked in her own home just because she wouldn't give 36p to some children for some chips.Other people at risk are Housewives,Businessmen, Firms and Children. By Shirley Telford
